value.name: Deputies firing on charging dog hit, kill teen boy
value.description: PALMDALE, Calif. (AP ... The boy's mother, Roberta Alcantar, said his name was Armando Garcia-Muro, the eldest of four siblings about to start his senior year of high school.

value.name: Authorities: Ricocheted bullet meant for dog killed teen boy
value.description: PALMDALE, Calif. (AP ... The boy's mother, Roberta Alcantar, said his name was Armando Garcia-Muro, the eldest of four siblings about to start his senior year of high school.
